how-to-implement: in your meta.json - define *extended* with url to this (json) file - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cardanians/adapools.org/master/example-meta.json

about.server: Hosted in AWS USA East Region. Low latency, enterprise grade bandwidth and 24/7 uptime.
about.company: The Beer Money Stake Pool team is based out of The United States of America and consist of IT professionals with backgrounds in a variety of areas from System Administration to Information Security. We love driking beer and discussing emerging technologies and out of one of these sessions our stake pool was born.
